thread.title: Palladium Hotel close to Central station, great location
thread.title_full: Palladium Hotel close to Central station, great location - Review of Hotel Palladium Palace, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: belinda m
title: Palladium Hotel close to Central station, great location
text:
This great location hotel is in short walking distance to Central station. Good for families. Everything is within walking distance and hotel staff were very friendly and helpful would definitely stay again if returning to Italy which is highly likely
Room Tip: Great location near Central Station suit families with children and couples alike See more room tips
